name: SPACE CHIMPS (itch)
description:
SPACE CHIMPS is a small tabletop roleplaying game for 3-5 chimps on their journeys through space. Visit distant planets, interact with exciting locals, and undertake perilous missions for the space program. 

The game is available for free in text-only form, where it is about three pages long. The paid version is a one-page game that, dare I say, has a slightly prettier layout. 

SPACE CHIMPS is largely inspired by the musical works of Clutch, in particular Spacegrass and Escape from the Prison Planet, as well as Mobius Interactive's Outer Wilds. One additional shoutout goes to the Chilluminati Podcast community, where the initial idea was spawned earlier this morning.

Happy journeys!
---

Minor update: I realized I'd missed re-editing a few things in the artsy version, so I've quickly pushed a new version. Content has stayed the same.
